text: He propped himself on one elbow."You can't do it to me, Nick. I've worked this room up to my way of thinking like I'd educate a child. This room and me understands one another.""Sam," Nick said firmly, "either you and me share downstairs, and we have Mag, or you stick it out up here and we all get saddled with the First Flower for ever."
